Title: The Cadet Blue Harding Check Casual Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Fall calls for the rich subdued wardrobe colors that we love And The Harding Check brings those colors without breaking a sweat before the temperatures cool down Woven from a lightweight cotton with a dash of stretch this versatile check will move with you for ultimate comfort Keep in step with the season and look sharp while in The Harding Check Fabric 98 Cotton 2 Stretch sourced from the world s finest mills Collar This shirt has a button down collar some photos do not feature the correct collar Cuff Double button barrel cuff Length Shortened for untucked or tucked wear Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Cadet Blue Tennyson Plaid Casual Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Back by popular demand this autumn inspired plaid is seasonal all star Crafted with lightly brushed cotton The Tennyson feels like your favorite flannel But thanks to its lightweight basketweave it becomes a wear now style that will layer perfectly under a sport coat or sweater later in the season And with some variation in the plaid this plaid has subtle visual texture to keep things interesting Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The White Draper Hidden-Button Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This is no ordinary Oxford The Draper is constructed with 100 Egyptian cotton from the legendary Italian mill Thomas Mason Using extra long staple cotton grown exclusively in the Nile Delta the result is an incredibly fine lightweight and soft Oxford Special features include a hidden button down collar to ensure you look sharp with or without a tie The Draper is an elevated dress style ideal for your next business or formal occasion Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Thomas Mason Collar Hidden button down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The White Charlevoix French Cuff Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Charlevoix is composed of long staple Egyptian cotton known for its strength and ultrafine yarn size Renowned Italian mill Thomas Mason grows this incredible cotton on the banks of the Nile River and crafted this rich Oxford with an incredibly soft feel and light weight Finished with a French placket and rounded French cuffs for a refined formal look A perfect shirt for any formal or business occasion all year round Fabric 100 Egyptian Cotton sourced from luxury Italian mill Thomas Mason Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Rounded French Cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The White Bancroft Poplin Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>It s time to rethink what you know about luxury poplin Introducing our most luxurious white shirt yet The Bancroft Poplin is composed of Gatsby Egyptian cotton known for its strength and ultrafine yarn size Renowned Italian mill Thomas Mason grows this incredible cotton on the banks of the Nile River and crafted this rich poplin with an incredibly soft feel and light weight A perfect shirt for any formal or business occasion all year round Fabric 100 Egyptian Cotton sourced from luxury Italian mill Thomas Mason Collar The Ledbury Mid Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a trim fit throughout the torso Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="false"><string>15 / 34 - Classic</string><variant>31506840715351</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15.5 / 34 - Classic</string><variant>29459814416471</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16 / 35 - Classic</string><variant>29459814449239</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16.5 / 35 - Classic</string><variant>29459814482007</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17 / 36 - Classic</string><variant>29459814514775</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17.5 / 36 - Classic</string><variant>29459814547543</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>18 / 37 - Classic</string><variant>29459814580311</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>18.5 / 37 - Classic</string><variant>29459814613079</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15 / 34 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814645847</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15.5 / 34 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814678615</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16 / 35 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814711383</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16.5 / 35 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814744151</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17 / 36 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814776919</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17.5 / 36 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814842455</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This seasons best stripe Woven by the experts at Somelos in Portugal The Harlan Stripe is made of 85 cotton and 15 linen and woven in a loose textured weave for loads of airflow Featuring thin blue horizontal stripes this is the ultimate summery nautical inspired shirt Stay sharp and keep cool this summer in a cotton linen style like The Harlan Stripe Fabric 85 Cotton 15 Linen sourced from Somelos in Portugal Collar The button down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Length Shortened for untucked or tucked wear Fit Available in tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="false"><string>15 / 34</string><variant>31306529701975</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15.5 / 34</string><variant>31306529734743</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16 / 35</string><variant>31306529767511</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16.5 / 35</string><variant>31306529800279</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17 / 36</string><variant>31306529833047</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>17.5 / 36</string><variant>31306529865815</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Blue Eckerson Dobby Dot Dress Shirt

Title: The Lavender Danvers Houndstooth Dress Shirt

Title: The Blue Mayfield Stripe Washed Oxford Casual Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Mayfield Stripe Oxford is a classic menswear staple A traditional Oxford featuring a blue and white stripe and a button collar you ll find just about any reason to wear The Mayfield Stripe Dressing well doesn t have to be complex Pair this Oxford with our Franklin 5 pockets for a sharp and casual warm weather look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from the world s finest mills Collar Button down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Light Blue Short Sleeve Covington Cotton Linen Casual Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The search for the perfect short sleeve button down is over The Covington features a cotton linen blend that ll keep you cool and comfortable Detailed with a chest pocket French placket and even back hem for a sharp untucked look This warm weather style has a sun faded slubby look perfect for summer wear from the backyard to the beach Fabric 70 Cotton 30 Linen sourced from the Spanish mill Sidogras Collar Button down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Hem Balanced hem for untucked wear Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Length Shortened for untucked or tucked wear Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>A slim fit moleskin pant that you can still move around in Moleskin gets its distinct plush hand feel from its unique construction While it may seem similar to brushed finishes it is actually a type of pile fabric that is sheared at the finishing stage similar to corduroy or velvet The end result is unbelievably soft and the perfect weight for fall and winter Fabric 98 Cotton with 2 Comfort Stretch Fit Slim fit Inseam 33 inch inseam Rise Mid rise Machine wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Iron on low medium heat Pants can be professionally dry cleaned nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>30</string><variant>28402609651799</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>31</string><variant>28402609684567</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>32</string><variant>28402609717335</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>33</string><variant>28402609750103</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>34</string><variant>28402609782871</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>35</string><variant>28402609815639</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>28402609848407</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>38</string><variant>28402609881175</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>40</string><variant>28402609913943</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Stone Richmond Washed Twill Short
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Richmond Washed Twill Short is made from a comfortable cotton linen washed twill with an 8 inseam that hits just above the knee without revealing too much thigh the ideal sweet spot between classic and modern With a regular rise you can tuck in any of our shirts comfortably These shorts are perfect for weekend barbecues and warm days outside Fabric 52 Linen 48 Cotton Inseam 8 Short Inseam Rise Sits just below waist Machine wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Iron on low medium heat Pants can be professionally dry cleaned nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="false"><string>30</string><variant>31413094809687</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>34</string><variant>31413094907991</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>31413094973527</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>38</string><variant>31413095006295</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Pecan Delmont Herringbone Sport Coat
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Delmont is one of our favorites this year This herringbone linen creates tons of visual texture lending interest and depth Perfect for a summer wedding or evening out the Delmont is unlined with a soft shoulder for a contemporary flattering fit Layer it over a pop of color or an essential Oxford for an effortless look Fabric 100 Linen Fit Our Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is unlined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two button closure Four non functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Dry Clean Only nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>31311141568599</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Sage Heather Norcrest Polo
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This sage polo is ready for summer An ultra soft cotton silk blend comes in a jersey knit to keep you cool and comfortable Accented with a chest pocket and a heather knit lending visual interest and a casual look Fabric 90 Cotton 10 Silk Buttons Shell Buttons Fit Runs slightly large to account for marginal shrinkage during laundering We recommend ordering your normal size If in between sizes we recommend sizing down Machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying will cause shrinkage If ironing use low to medium heat Polos can be professionally dry cleaned nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>S</string><variant>31306533994583</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>M</string><variant>31306534027351</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>L</string><variant>31306534060119</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>XL</string><variant>31306534092887</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>XXL</string><variant>31306534125655</variant></size></sizes></sections>
